comments.text:
有人估计，GDP每减少1%，人均预期寿命就会减少3到5天。我们常说“生命无价”，但事实很残酷。

https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/LdaMgSMrY2YcqZ5w3jaIhA

data.text:
港中文学者：像上海这样的一线城市封一个月，会使整个中国的实际GDP减少4%

Jingjing Chen, Wei Chen, Ernest Liu, Jie Luo, and Zheng (Michael) Song:The Economic Cost of Lockdown in China: Evidence from City-to-City Truck Flows.

https://www.econ.cuhk.edu.hk/econ/images/Documents/Truck_Flow_and_COVID19_220315.pdf
